channel.title: Doepfer on DavidCraddock.net
channel.description: Recent content in Doepfer on DavidCraddock.net

item.title: Modular Progress
item.description: My Eurorack modular has been progressing. I’ve added several low-cost modules, a Doepfer A-138b audio mixer module so I can mix the audio outputs of the oscilators, the noise output, and my Doepfer Dark Energy modules. I found this so useful with the Dark Energys that I have ordered another mixer. This I can use to mix audio before sending it to the filter, for example, or mix audio before sending it to a VCA to be amplified.
